Bellevue.KOIL: KOIL (1290 kHz) is a commercial AM radio station, licensed to Omaha, Nebraska. It is owned by NRG Media (headquartered in Cedar Rapids, Iowa) and airs a Talk radio format. KOIL's weekday schedule is mostly nationally syndicated talk shows such as Don Imus, Laura Ingraham, Sean Hannity, Mark Levin, Jim Bohannon, Clyde Lewis and Jerry Doyle.
